<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 9+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Sonic Tuning Mace](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1075)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Sonic" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=147" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 189 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Weapon** [Light Mace](/Weapons.aspx?ID=5)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This _+1 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [thundering](/Equipment.aspx?ID=306) [light mace](/Weapons.aspx?ID=5)_ has twin tips, perfectly spaced to resonate when striking foes.

<document level="2" id="action-865" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 9"
pfs="Standard"
>
Sonic Tuning Mace
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 189 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 700 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 13"
pfs="Standard"
>
Sonic Tuning Mace (Greater)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 189 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 3,000 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

The mace is a _+2 greater striking thundering light mace_. When you activate the mace to cast _sound burst_, the spell is 6th level (DC 30).
name: Sonic Tuning Mace (Greater)
